Description
Wendell Rohr (Hoffman) is a torts lawyer taking on the gun lobby. Rankin Fitch (Hackman) is the jury consultant for the Defendants and between them the battle is for the hearts and minds of the jury. But what they're about to discover, is that one man and one woman stand in their way.
